# Use case examples

1. Add an expense of AMOUNT CURRENCY to group GROUP_NAME, splitting it equally with USER_NAME and adding a comment COMMENT.
2. Show all expenses currently in group GROUP_NAME for the month MONTH.
3. Create a new group GROUP_NAME and add USER_NAME or USER_EMAIL to it.
4. Display the list of active groups the current user belongs to.
5. Edit the simplify_by_default setting for group GROUP_NAME.
6. Find expenses for a particular category (e.g., housing) in month MONTH in group GROUP_NAME and change the amount to AMOUNT.
7. Find the expense EXPENSE_NAME in GROUP_NAME and split it by shares: 3 for USER_NAME and 1 for me.
8. Generate a report for the previous month for group GROUP_NAME by expense categories, analyse trends and provide recommendations.
9. Retrieve the current user’s outstanding balances across all groups and show who owes whom and how much.
10. Settle debts in group GROUP_NAME by generating an optimal set of payments for the members.
11. Delete the specific expense EXPENSE_ID from group GROUP_NAME.
12. Invite a friend USER_EMAIL to an existing group GROUP_NAME and assign them as a member.
13. Retrieve detailed information for the expense EXPENSE_ID: participants, amounts and comments.
14. Produce a list of all friends or group members, with the ability to filter by name.
15. Edit an existing expense EXPENSE_ID and manually adjust each participant’s share.
16. Change or assign a category for expense EXPENSE_ID.
17. Obtain the list of notifications from Splitwise and mark them as read.
18. Archive group GROUP_NAME to make it inactive while preserving data.
19. Calculate the total amount paid and owed by USER_NAME in group GROUP_NAME for the month MONTH.
20. Generate a comparative spending report between two periods MONTH1 and MONTH2 in group GROUP_NAME.
21. Convert all expenses in group GROUP_NAME for the month MONTH from currency CURRENCY_FROM to CURRENCY_TO using current exchange rates.
22. Export all expenses of group GROUP_NAME for a year or range to a CSV or table.
23. Search for expenses containing KEYWORD in the description or comments in group GROUP_NAME.
24. Assign a custom label or project name to expense EXPENSE_ID.
25. Add multiple new expenses at once to group GROUP_NAME via a batch request.
26. Retrieve the list of available categories
27. Mark expense EXPENSE_ID as personal so it is excluded from group splitting.
28. Find expenses exceeding a certain threshold AMOUNT in group GROUP_NAME.
29. Consolidate expenses from multiple groups GROUP_LIST for a single user USER_NAME into one report.
30. Automatically distribute a payment AMOUNT among all participants in group GROUP_NAME based on their outstanding debts.
31. Set simplify_by_default when creating a new group.
32. Set a default currency CURRENCY_CODE for future expenses in group GROUP_NAME.
33. Generate quarterly reports for each category in group GROUP_NAME.
34. Assign roles (admin, member) to users in group GROUP_NAME and restrict who can edit expenses.
35. Retrieve the list of all pending invitations to group GROUP_NAME and allow the user to accept or decline them.
36. Delete or leave group GROUP_NAME permanently.
37. Adjust the list of participants in an existing expense EXPENSE_ID by adding or removing USER_NAME.
38. Sort the list of expenses in group GROUP_NAME by date, amount or category.
39. Filter expenses by their status (pending, settled, deleted) in group GROUP_NAME.
40. Provide a summary of contributions of each participant (how much they have paid and how much they owe) in group GROUP_NAME.
41. Retrieve all members from different groups and summarize their balances.
42. Split expense EXPENSE_ID according to specified percentages for each participant.
